SEARCH
Package controller

Class SearchResultsController

java.lang.Object
controller.SearchResultsController
public class SearchResultsController extends Object
Controller class for the search results screen. This class is responsible for handling user input and displaying the search results. The user can create a new album from the search results or return to the homepage. The search results are displayed in a gallery view.
Author:
jacobjude
